text: Misoli in zindagii dunjo cun ʙoronest, ki az osmon nozil kunem, to ʙa on har guna rastaniho az zamin ʙirujad, ci onho, ki odamijon mexurand va ci onho, ki corpojon mecarand. Cun zamin zinati xud ʙargirift va orosta sud va mardumas pindostand, ki xud qodir ʙar on hama ʙudaand, farmoni Mo saʙhangom jo ʙa ruz darrasad va cunon az ʙexas ʙarkanem, ki gui diruz dar on makon hec ciz naʙudaast, Ojotro ʙaroi mardume, ki meandesand, incunin tafsil medihem
